name: Andrea Haller
text:
The staff is very knowledgeable and professional whether you are buying Pandora or a larger purchase they love to help and will make sure you love your purchase. They also show you many options and help you to get the biggest bang for your buck.
I have found my hometown jewelry store-thanks ladies

resp.text: Thank you Andrea for the super kind words. We appreciate you choosing us 🙏

name: Brian Hughes
text: Very courteous and friendly staff. Beautiful inventory. I will absolutely purchase from Diamond again.

resp.text: Thank you Brian! We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again.

name: Loren Garofalo
text: These people are the absolute best to deal with! Knowledgeable, courteous, helpful and will go the extra mile to make sure the customer is happy. We highly recommend them!!

resp.text: Thank you Loren! Always a pleasure!

name: Jessica Krohmer
text: Gulf shores humidity wasn't kind to my hand and caused my fingers to swell awful.  The staff at Diamond Jewelers was AMAZING and extremely professional when I had to have my ring cutoff.  The best part is that they did it in a way that the ring can be easily repaired when I get home.

resp.text: Jessica, so sorry this happened and yes, the humidity is brutal here in GS. Hope you are doing good and please come again 💗

name: Gina Cardin
text: Boyfriend popped the question while on vacation and the ring was too small. Called this wonderful place  and they had it sized in under an hr! Even polished up the ring for me ( it was his mother’s engagement ring) fixed a prong on it for me too!! Nice friendly service!!! Good prices!!! Thank you so much!!

resp.text: Thanks for choosing us Gina, happy would could help. Please come back to see us 💗

name: HayesDeeM Hayes
text: I want ro say thank you to the wonderful gentleman  and staff who worked on my newly purchased 25th wedding anniversary ring for upsizing.. I needed it same day and they delivered. I am not a resident of Alabama but was  just visiting on vacation. I thank the nice ladies that helped fulfill the orders and speed the process alongThank you for making my.trip a wonderful  memory.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing us! What kind words, we really appreciate the positive feedback. Come back to see us when you’re in the area 😊

name: Jenny Frieze
text: Lori was awesome and shared with me new Pandora charms. I went in for 1 to remember our trip and bought 3! I would definitely shop here again.

resp.text: It was a pleasure Jenny! Thanks for choosing us and for taking time for the kind words 💗

name: David Bartels
text: We make our annual stop at Diamond Jewelers to celebrate our anniversary. They always are very caring and take the time to do things right. If you want the best service and the best jewelry shop here.

resp.text: Thank you David for the generous positive feedback, we appreciate you!

name: Louis Orefice
text: Great place to shop for your wife.  Enjoy working with the personnel, fun and informative.  Prices are also reasonable.

name: douglas e. hazard
text:
Most pleasant team in town. Patient, experienced, understanding. Could not have been more pleased with the service my fiancee and I received.
Thanks for a great morning.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind  words Douglas, we are grateful you chose us. Please come seee us again soon ☺️

name: Beth K
text: First time local customer. Lorrie was very pleasant to work with. Ring and watch were taken care of while I waited. Thanks so much. We'll be back!

name: Holly Sollie

name: Robin palisades
text: My consultant Stephanie, was lovely. I dress very casual and usually get ignored in jewelry boutiques, but not here. She went above and beyond today and made me feel very comfortable and valued as a customer. I am now a loyal customer for life.

name: Pamela Antoine

name: anita bonfili

name: Karen Costa

name: John Mitchell
text: Awesome experience and very welcoming atmosphere. I bought Pandora, they have a very good selection. Staff was extremely polished and polite. Will definitely shop her for all my jewelry needs.

name: Larcy Sorensen

text: Love Diamond Jewelers is absolutely wonderful!  I love dealing with Stephanie, she is the nicest, most knowledgeable and professional person ever!

name: Tiffany Knight
text: Great Customer Service!!!  Mrs. Mae was Amazing!! She was very Helpful Kind and Patient! My visit at Diamond Jewelers was Awesome!! I would definitely recommend!!! Thanks Again!!😘

text:
This jeweler is awesome!

Tim & Robin

name: Taylor Daily

name: Colby R.
text: Very friendly place. Good assortment of inventory. The only jewelry place in South Baldwin County I know of that sells Pandora.

name: Eric Tillotson
text: Found this store on google and stopped by while on vacation to shop for engagement rings. The staff were all incredibly friendly. My fiancé chose a stone and separate setting. They set the stone and had the ring ready same day for us because we were planning to leave town that afternoon. Lorrie was amazing and worked with us to get the sale done despite their computers having issues that day. Highly recommended.

name: Dana Tapia, Realtor at RE/MAX of Orange Beach
text: I was recently shopping for a very special piece of jewelry. The folks at Diamond Jewelers were so helpful and fun! Selection was great and after shopping around various jewelry stores, I went back to Diamond Jewelers. I wasn't sure exactly what I was looking for when I began my search but, ended up falling in love with the first piece I tried on and had to go back for it. The entire experience was FUN and incredibly memorable!! I highly recommend Diamond Jewelers!!

resp.text: Thank you, Dana!  I was so happy to meet you and it was such a pleasure helping you pick out your perfect ring!  I can’t wait to visit with you and Allen again in the future!  We’ve got to find that perfect wedding band for you!  Thanks again!  — Lorrie

name: Anita Housand
text: Wonderful staff, great customer service, always treat you like a very good friend!

name: kimberly mccauley
text: Love this jewelry store!  Nice selection, reasonable prices, and super friendly and helpful staff. It’s a must visit when in this area.

name: Lee Hicks
text:
SUPER SERVICE!!! Everyone goes over board to make sure you are pleased with their work.
I would recommend using them for any of your jewelry needs.
Cannot tell you how happy I am with their work!!!

Lee, Thanks so much for the super review! We appreciate you choosing us!
Blessings,
From all of us at Dj’s

name: Crystal Buzard
text: We love the girls at Diamond Jewelers. They are the sweetest ever. My husband buys me jewelry every year for our Anniversary there the jewelry is always beautiful and very high quality!!!

name: Sharon Hawthorne
text: Our family loved to shop at Diamond jewelers! They are always friendly courteous and knowledgeable.  Such Gorgeous and Unique pieces of Jewelry!  I recommend Diamond Jewelers to all of my friends. Thank u Daphne, Lorrie, Dawn and Stephanie ! Y’all are exceptional!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Sheri! We love what we do and blessed to have friends like you to come visit and shop 💝

name: allym205
text: The staff members at this store are amazing. Stephanie helped me with information about ring sizing and was super sweet. She seemed genuinely interested in my engagement! Unfortunately, due to my warranty plan on my ring, I was unable to have my ring sized through Diamond Jewelers but I will be back for bands! Thanks again Stephanie!

resp.text: Thank you for the super kind words! I’m very excited for you. Enjoyed talking to you and appreciate you stopping by to see us.

name: Jennifer Spruiell
text: Stellar service and fast with two repairs for me. Always so welcoming and attentive. Feels like family. I like to go to a place where they call you by name and treat you like you are the most important matter of the day. Amazing!

resp.text: Thank you for the sweet comment Jennifer, we always enjoy your company ❤️

name: Tanner Howard
text: Diamond Jewelers is my favorite jewelry store, not only due to their great selection, but more importantly, their service. I'm always treated kindly, and the staff goes out of it's way to make their customers happy. The owners are extremely generous, and we are fortunate to have this family-owned business in our community.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Tanner. We appreciate the positive feedback 💗

name: Kelli Perkins
text:
At First when I walked in I thought, oh my I just possibly could be in the wrong place as far as my budget goes. Then was  immediately greeted by a warm smiling face! I  quickly realized I was going to be able to shop here. Laurie was outstanding, she knew all  The answers to my questions and those that she did not she quickly found the answer!
After purchasing something, I decided to get them to repair my jewelry that I was looking for a jeweler to do.  I just found  where I will be doing my jewelry shopping and recommending family and friends !!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. It was so nice to meet you Kelli, looking  forward to seeing you soon. Have a Merry Christmas

name: Denise B. Owens
text: Always a pleasure to shop at Diamond Jewelers. Dawn McKenzie is truly a blessing. She knows the perfect thing to show you out of a choice of millions. Great customer service in the store or by telephone.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. We appreciate your business.

name: Jeanette Breault
text: They shipped out the order and arrived two days earlier than promised with a hand written Thank You! on the receipt. Very nice.

resp.text: Thank you Jeanette, glad your order came earlier than expected. And many thanks for the kind review 💗😊

name: Katelin Wilkins
text: What an amazing experience! I was so sad to drop my engagement ring off. It is a family piece and I didn't want to part with it long. I dropped it off on Monday morning and had it back on my finger 2 days later. They not only cleaned and buffed it, but they replaced prongs, took it down nearly 2 sizes and gave me a measurement on the carat weight of the center diamond. The fit is perfect and I could not be happier! Thank you so so much Diamond Jewelers!

resp.text: So happy you are pleased Katelin. We appreciate you💝

name: Maves Youngblood
text: The place was packed! Standing room only! And, yet, I was immediately greeted, directed to the right person and assisted. Professional, speedy and fairly priced. What else can you ask for? Great experience.

resp.text: Thank you Maves! I’m glad we could serve you in a timely manner. We appreciate you being patient? It does get a little busy 💝

name: Guelph Ontario
text: Have always had a great experience with Diamond Jewelers in Gulf Shores. Today was not. I will not return to Diamond Jewelers ever again. I did not enjoy the rude and condescending attitude Daphne exhibited towards me. I’ve never been treated that way in the past. But I’ll tell you it was enough to put me off from ever spending any of my hard earned money there again. Do yourself a favor and drive to Manning Jewelry in Foley. The staff there was beyond friendly. I’ll be doing business with Manning from here on out. Diamond Jewelers might need a little refresher on customer service.

resp.text:
I'm saddened to read this, in no way whatsoever did I realize that I was being condescending. This is my family's store and I'm so grateful to everyone that comes through the door. I truly did not mean to come across in a negative way that was not my intention. I want to offer you a $50 gift card from me.

My deepest apologies

name: Patty King
text: Such sweet people. I think it was “Lorrie” who helped me the last 2 visits. She is so kind, professional, and knowledgeable.  She greets me with a welcoming smile as soon as I walk in the door.  One of the tiny stones had fallen out of my sterling silver ring that I’ve had for months, and Lorrie made sure to get it fixed in just 2 days (so I would have it for my trip out of town). Just wonderful!  I will always be a Diamond World customer. Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you Patty! I appreciate the sweet compliment. Hope you have a Happy Mother’s Day 💝

name: Jennifer Clough
text: Absolutely love Diamond Jewelers.  Had my engagement ring sized and it fits perfectly.  They also shined and puffed it and it looks amazing. Definitely will be using them in the future for all my jewelry needs. Stephanie is very sweet and super professional.

resp.text: Thanks Jennifer!! It was so nice meeting you & that precious Lennox!! We appreciate you coming in!! Enjoy your pretty ring! Take Care! Stephanie

name: Jackie Wireman
text: I had to return a product that I purchased a few months ago they were so pleasant with no questions gladly gave me a new product and it was a great great visit I would go there anytime for anything they stand behind all their products what more can you ask for I would recommend their beautiful shop to everybody Jackie Wireman

resp.text: Thanks Ms. Jackie!! We always love our visits with you! :)

name: Debbie Walters
text: Wonderful experience. My Apple Watch band got stuck on the watch. Took it in and the Jeweler was able to fix it right away. While I was waiting I inquired about a tennis necklace pendant. The ladies were so helpful. They found the tennis racket pendant and also helped me pick out a one really nice chain. Will definitely keep going back. Everyone was so pleasant and helpful.

resp.text: We appreciate your business Debbie! Thank you for the kind words

name: Megann Steege
text: I will definitely be returning to Diamond Jewelers! Top of the line selections, and the staff was amazing. Jeff Goodman went above and beyond to make my experience one to remember.

resp.text: Thank you Megann, you’re  the best and we appreciate all that you do for our city

name: Debbie Phares
text: Found the perfect item. Diamond Jewelers had a good selection. Lorrie was very friendly and helpful. The jeweler will have our item ready in a day or earlier.  To get personal attention, fair prices, and great service visit Diamond Jewelers first.

resp.text: Thank you Debbie! We are thankful you chose us. Hope you have a Happy Mother’s Day 💝

name: D Kirkdoffer
text: Stephanie is one of the nicest sales persons! Her sweet spirit is contagious!  And she is very knowledgeable of fine jewelry. Thanks to her we will visit again.

name: Missy Tyler
text: I stopped in to have links removed from a Tag watch. Although I spent very little, the staff treated me like a dear friend. That is typical of this lovely shop. We love Diamond Jewelers, especially Lorrie!

name: Blake Rowell
text: Fantastic service at every turn. You can’t go wrong here.

name: Maureen Crawford

Very friendly and helpful people! We were visiting from Illinois. Our small town no longer has a full service local jeweler, and we needed a ring cut off, a replacement earring back, and some pieces cleaned. Ours was not a high ticket purchase, but we were treated as if it were.
They have some beautiful pieces, and a beautiful store!

resp.text: Maureen, that is so sweet! Thanks for taking the time to message the generous comment, please come see us again 💕

name: Cyndie Pankonien
text: I found this store from an ad they had in a travelers station when we were passing through. I contacted them about Pandora charms they had for their area & ordered some for my mom and myself. She has since passed away and this was the last trip we took together.  I noticed my dangle on my charm was missing. I called as soon as I noticed it. They were so kind to send me a replacement charm at a discounted price. I highly recommend this business!! Thank you Diamond Jewelers for helping me to keep my memory keepsake!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the sweet personal message, hoping you have the best New Year ahead and may you be blessed with much joy!

name: Shane Smith
text: Always, very friendly and helpful.

name: Debra Tarr
text: Always the best service and quality!  Picked out a beautiful necklace for my nieces high school graduation. Amazing staff and amazing service. I will be a regular forever :-).

name: Yessicaa CohRin
text: They are always welcoming with a smile! Love the pandora section my girlfriend gets me rings for every holiday from there! I had a stone fall out and they replaced it within a day! Very good prices and well worth the money!

name: Annette Ross
text: Wonderful shop! As always, Lorie was a "jewel "!  Have made several purchases and plan to make more in the future! A hometown atmosphere that is hard to beat! A great staff! Thanks for always making me feel welcome!

name: judy blair
text: I I purchased a very nice Pandora charm at Diamond Jewelers in Gulf l Shoes, Alabama today. The girl who waited on me was very familiar with their Pandora merchandise. resp.text:
Mrs. Judy,

Sincerely,
Mary Kathryn

name: Courtney Steffek
text: Fantastic service, warm, caring and professional staff! Great place to trust with your valuables.  LOVE LOVE LOVE these people!

name: Nancy Shawhan

text: I am new to Diamond Jewelers and have found my jewelers.  My engagement ring and wedding set are gorgeous.  The staff is fabulous and such a pleasure. We will go nowhere else.

name: Dale Mikkelsen

name: Sue Carol
text: The associate was awesome! She recommended some beautiful jewelry, one that I did purchase. Also had links removed from a new watch which they did right away! Highly recommend this jewelry store!!

name: Sandy Dobrzynski
text: I was looking for Pandora charms and earring hoops.  They had both and a very helpful sales  lady helped me out.  When I got back to Wisconsin I immediately put them together and absolutely love my Orange Beach bracelet. ( May have to get matching charms for my earrings too)

resp.text: Thank you Sandy! Congrats on your Pandora purchase and please let us know if we can help you in any way. Check out our website...you can order online and we will be happy to ship you anything.

name: Janice Murphy
text: My very first Pandora purchase couldn’t have been better! Lorrie was wonderful and endured my endless, newbie questions with warm, friendly professionalism. Our stop at Diamond Jewelers was fun and informative. We will definitely be back!

resp.text: Janice, I thoroughly enjoyed your visit, and was so happy to meet your friends, as well!  Please come back to see us when you're in Gulf Shores....and don't forget to call me with your Wish List!

name: Lenora Neal
text: I purchase a Pandora Charm each time we take a vacation.  Diamond Jewelers in Gulf Shores has  great selection of Pandora Charms!  Their staff is very friendly and helpful.

name: Kimberly Ray
text: Always a wonderful experience at Diamond Jewelers! Everyone on staff - Daphne, Dawn, Lori, Mary Kathryn & Stephanie are so welcoming and easy to work with. It only took 10 minutes from the time I went in until I had picked out what I wanted, had it rang up, paid for and wrapped beautifully. Thank you ladies for all of your hard work!

name: Kyle Sparks
text: I just went in to the store to see if they sold engagement ring boxes. The one I have is very noticeable when in my pocket. They only sold ones with their name on it. They were very professional in telling me so. As I walked back to the parking lot the lady flagged my back down and brought me 2 very nice boxes that she was able to find and wished me good luck. Free of charge. That saved me a lot of troubles. Thank you

resp.text:
Kyle,
Thank you so much for taking your time to write this sweet experience.  We are so glad we could help you with something that seemed so simple.  If you ever need anything at all, don't hesitate to call.  Congratulations!
Dawn

name: April DePaola
text: The ONLY jeweler to use!!!  I stopped in today expecting to have to leave my jewelry for repair but they took care of it on the spot. Great selection of jewelry and the employees are the most helpful without being pushy for a sale. It’s worth your while to stop in and look periodically just to see the new items they’ve received in the estate area too. :-).

resp.text:
You are so sweet April! I enjoyed seeing you and that precious baby boy! It's always a pleasure helping you! Thanks for your kind words! :)
Sincerely,
Stephanie

name: Jessica OBanner
text:
I've been coming to Gulf Shores for years.  This past trip was memorable like all the rest. However, I wanted to add some Pandora Charms to my bracelet to commemorate this visit. I googled to see if there were any jewelry stores in the area that carried the brand. Diamond Jewelers have an entire section of Pandora Merchandise. I was warmly greeted as soon as I entered the store. **There wasn't that awkward silence like someone is estimating how much you're going to spend.**  The saleswoman was informative, patient, and attentive. Great customer service will always leave a lasting impression. I'll definitely be returning.
J. from Jackson, MS

name: Kew Taybi
text: This was my first purchase at this jewelry store. They came highly recommended by a friend and I was not disappointed. The sales lady who met me was most helpful and give me several options at very reasonable prices.

name: Linda Richmond
text: I just made my first purchase from Diamond Jewelers this past week. They were very professional, friendly and helpful. They have a great selection of jewelry and all at great prices. I will definitely be returning to make future purchases.

name: Tom Martin
text: Having recently moved to Gulf Shore, this was our first visit to Diamond Jewelers.  We could not have been more impressed with the extensive knowledge and friendliness of the entire sales staff.  Stephanie was exceptional patiently guiding us through their large estate jewelry inventory.   Diamond Jewelers is now our “go to” jewelry store for all our fine jewelry purchases.

resp.text:
Tom,
Thank you so much for your sweet review.  We are so happy to have you in our area and are glad you feel at home with the store! I'm always here to help if you need anything at all!
Sincerely,
Stephanie

name: Barbette Driver
text: I stopped in Diamond Jewelers to get a battery replaced in a waterproof watch and the staff welcomed me as if I did business in there often and was a regular customer.  The jeweler also fixed a necklace.  The charge was very reasonable .  I highly recommended them for your jewelry needs.

name: Wendy Ingram
text: Jewelry repair top notch! Exceptional customer service with Lorrie as well. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Wendy! Hope you have a great rest of your summer 🌴🌞🍉

name: Pam Harris
text: Delightful Experience! The staff was very professional, knowledgeable, and personable. I loved working with Dawn  -- She provided personized service...going the extra mile to ensure that I was completely satisfied with my purchase.  What I valued most was her genuine excitement and happiness for me - she made it fun!!!!!  Looking forward to my next shopping experience at Diamond Jewelers!

name: Phyllis Britt
text: I initially went to Diamond Jewelers two years ago to buy the Gulf Shores Pandora charm for our daughters, daughter in laws and granddaughter.  Since then I have bought many Pandora charms for birthdays and Christmas.  Last Fall I broke a favorite paisley necklace, took it by to see if they could repair.  They did !!  Yesterday they helped me get new battery for my husband's watch.  I cannot say enough how nice everyone is. So glad I found them and would recommend them to friends and family.

resp.text: thank you Phyllis for the sweet generous feedback. Thank you for letting us serve you!

name: Jan Marsh
text: I asked that DJ  find a specific stone for a ring and a setting to accommodate a specific carat weight of diamonds around the stone — all within a budget amount. They quickly got in two stones and two settings to meet these requirements for me to see. I selected the stone and setting and the finished ring (which they shipped to me) far exceeded my expectations. I love my sales person -Dawn. She worked tirelessly with many calls, texts pictures etc to make this happen.

name: Phil Payne
text:
It is always a great experience shopping at Diamond Jewelers. Jeff the owner always greets everyone with a smile as well as all the wonderful ladies that work there
Great selection of all kinds of diamonds and ladies jewelry
Always a pleasure to shop there

resp.text: We appreciate the kind words Phil! Thank you and Lisa for choosing us, we are blessed to have you as faithful customers ❤️

name: dennis holland
text: great experiance

resp.text: Thank you Dennis!

name: Mark Scarborough
text: The entire staff at Diamond Jewelers are always friendly and very helpful when I visit. Best jewelers in the area!

name: Clara Hendrix

name: Gerald Sanders
text:
Wonderful people. Excellent customer service. Always  a pleasure to do business with  Diamond Jewelers.

.

name: Penny Groux
text: Shopping at Diamond Jewelers is always a wonderful experience.  The care and personal attention given to customers is unparalleled and their knowledge and advice is always sincerely appreciated.  I’m so thankful I found such a great jeweler here on the beautiful Alabama Gulf Coast!

resp.text: You are the sweetest Penny! Thank you for the sweet message. Hope you guys have a blessed Christmas 🎄

name: Robert Lancaster
text: Very friendly,  helpful,  knowledgeable and accommodating.  Oh, and reasonable prices. What more could you ask for? My new hometown jeweler!

name: Steve Peralta
text:

text: I cannot say enough things about this jeweler! They have a beautiful high quality selection. We worked with Stephanie and she was so sweet patient and professional.  We purchased a new setting for my engagement ring solitaire while we were vacationing there and my solitaire fell out(after 10 years). They helped me select the perfect ring. We put it in layaway as our 10th anniversary was in December(this happened in June). I forgot to snap a picture of it while we were there so I called Stephanie and she happily got it out of the safe and put it on her own finger and sent me pictures via text message. She went above and beyond! We were shopping with our kids and they offered them chocolates and water. We called to have my diamond placed in the new ring on Wednesday of this week and they placed it on the same day we called and overnighted the ring to me for free. I live 6 hours from Gulf Shores. It was at my door the next morning. It is so beautiful! I am so thankful we went there to see about getting my original ring repaired and ended up with a gorgeous new ring that has special meaning since it was purchased at one of my favorite vacation spots. If you need a jeweler you can trust and who has a gorgeous selection give them a try. 👍🏼👍🏼

name: Megan Miller
text:
My husband and I went to pick out our wedding bands at Grogan Jewelers. I also was looking to get my grandmother's ring, which I was given as my engagement ring, resized and cleaned up. I was also told it needed to be fixed, as some of the prongs holding the diamond in were coming loose.

I was told it could take anywhere from 1-4 weeks for the bands, and the ring, well, the jeweler will be back on Tuesday to give you a quote on a cost. To his credit, the jeweler was wonderful. I got my quote and was told it would probably be ready by Monday.

Monday rolls around and it's not ready but that's okay. I understand delays happen, and it's not like I need the ring right this minute. I say thanks and on goes my day.. The next day I get a similar phonecall, but it's still fine, I get it.

The third day past due, my husband gets a call that the rings are ready and they're ready for pick up. He asks if it's all three. "Three? Um, there's only two." No, there are two bands and an engagement ring. "No, I only see two bands here. I don't see any engagement rings here. Let me look for the order I'll call you back."

So he looks. And he can't find it. Calls back. Some stern words are had regarding the fact that yes, we dropped of a ring for repairs and it should be there.

Keep in mind, this is my grandmother's ring. She is deceased. I have no words for how upset I was during this whole exchange.

Eventually they call back. They found it. The order should be complete "tomorrow"

No phone call that next day.

The following day I called back and was told yes, two rings are here for you.

I swear, I think I blacked out for a second.

Grogan, get your act together before you give someone a heart attack.

To the jeweler's credit, the ring fits great and looks amazing. The rest of you all can go get some training in how to deliver customer service without taking years off people's lives.

name: Jeffrey Marquie
text:
I purchased rings here and could not be more pleased.  I worked with Jeron Tidwell and he was extremely knowledgeable and helpful.  I was very unsure of what I wanted and Jeron patiently guided me through the process from sizing, selecting the materials to advising on the best delivery methods since I live out of town.
If you are looking at any fine jewelry purchases in the near future, I highly recommend this store and Jeron specifically.  He definitely went the extra mile for me with my purchase even calling to follow up several weeks later.  If I could give this store 6 stars I would!  I am very satisfied!

Several other Jewelers told me it could not be sized. So it sat in a special case hoping one day it would fit. When I spoke to Amanda she said she thought they would be able to size it. Just bring it in and they would see. I found out that the reason my ring didn't fit was because I was sold the wrong size. Amanda sized the ring, sized my finger and checked to make sure none of the stones were missing. She was so polite and professional. I felt so comfortable with them I even gave them my engagement and wedding ring to be cleaned. Amanda did the same thing checked to make sure I wasn't missing stones or had loose stones. I got my rings back today and I am so happy with them. Diamond Depot is definitely where's all my jewelry will go in the future. And I already have my eyes on my next Anniversary present. Thank you  Diamond Depot for doing such a spectacular job on my rings!! Thank you Amanda for making my experience easy and fun.

name: Joseph Mogill
text: I brought my watch in to get a new battery. The customer service was friendly, but they were unable to complete the service due to “not having a piece to close the back.” Since it was a “high end” watch, they needed to send it to a company for 2 weeks + $20. Didn’t seem right so I decline and they didn’t charge me for the new battery they gave me. I left with a bag full of watch parts. Later, I realized the gasket was damaged, I was missing parts, and with a battery that doesn’t work. This watch is a standard Tissot, and doesn’t need “special” parts to change out batteries. I will send my business elsewhere.

resp.text:
Hi Joseph.  In the 1000+ Watches we work on yearly, we do occasionally have a watch repair that requires a higher level of service than our on site Watch Repair shop feels comfortable offering. In those instances, we send the watch to our repairman in Texas, whom we have worked with for years, and they will repair and send back to us. The service is excellent and the pricing is very affordable for our customers.

Out of all the watches we have replaced a battery on this year, yours was the only one that we needed to send off for further inspection. The reason was because of a damaged gasket (so it appeared) - but certainly it was beyond our comfort level of repair locally. Rather than continue to work with it locally, we felt the need to move it to a higher tier repairman so that we could offer the best service on your watch. Your response was that you had someone in Georgia who has worked on it before and could put the back on with the gasket, no problem. You seemed as if it was no problem and we assumed that was the case.

It appears that there your repairman in Georgia saw a similar issue that we did - that there was still a problem.   Our repairmen would have had no issue providing the service that was needed to complete the task but I understand that you didn’t feel comfortable with us taking care of the problem for you further. I’m sorry you felt that way.  We certainly do everything we can to provide a level of service that makes people feel comfortable with allowing us to take care of them from start to finish. I believe, as you can see by the reviews, that we have always done our part to make things right and offer a service that ends with satisfaction.  While you may have felt uneasy about letting us finish the repair for you, I do not believe we have any type of reviews or history that would warrant that feeling from you. Instead, I believe it’s just the opposite - that we have a proven record (shown on reviews) of making sure all of our customers are fully satisfied and we work hard to maintain this level of service.

Either way, we are sorry you were unable to do business with us and see our service through to the end. But we wish you all the best.

name: Michelle Whitelaw
text:
I cannot say enough wonderful things about Diamond Depot. I had a loose diamond that I wanted to incorporate into a unique engagement ring. I work in Atlanta, so I decided to visit a well known jewelry designer in Buckhead. She was very knowledgeable, but had her own idea for the ring, and didn’t seem to listen to what I wanted.  Frustrated and disappointed after our third meeting, I decided to scrap the whole project.

When explaining the bad experience to a friend, she mentioned that Terry had recently designed an engagement ring for a relative which turned out beautifully. Since I live in Oxford, I figured I didn’t have anything to lose so I dropped in one day to check it out. During our first meeting, Terry really took the time to listen to me, made notes and offered suggestions when I asked for them.

Over the course of the design process, I completely changed what I wanted, but Terry and Amanda were very patient and encouraging. When I decided that I wanted side stones, they arranged to bring in three sets for me to view with my diamond to find the perfect match.  After I received the original CAD rendering, I realized that there were a few things that I wanted to change. Each suggestion was promptly incorporated into the design and a new CAD rendering sent.

I was able to pick up my finished ring on Christmas Eve, and it was more stunning than I had ever imagined. Even though this was a custom design that involved a lot of personal service, the price for the setting was very reasonable.  I have worked with various jewelers on other projects and I can say without a doubt that Terry and Amanda’s design capabilities and professionalism are the best I’ve experienced. Thank you guys for a beautiful, one-of-a-kind ring!!!

resp.text: Michelle thank you!  I hope you're enjoying that beautiful ring!  If we can help you with anything at all, please let us know!

Your items no matter how new you say it is, they are second hand therefore we can't pay you what you paid the store to get it.

text: This Used to be one of the best pawn shops around. Since they have changed locations though, they have become rather difficult. There are much better pawn shops than this one.

resp.text: Hello Tonya, I am very sorry to hear about your experience at our store.  We pride ourselves on customer service, We have always greeted everyone that comes in with courtesy and respect.  That has not changed since we have moved.  All our price are negotiable and we rotate our inventory daily.   We strive hard to make everyone happy but realize this is impossible.  We encourage you to stop back in and give us another try.

name: Wargasm644
text: Went in to look for a guitar. Found a really nice one hanging on the wall. I know what they sell for at music stores and eBay. An employee named Alex asked me if I’d like to plug it in and check it out? A sure sign that the employees are confident in what they sell. After checking it out for fret wear and any obvious flaws, I wanted it. It was very nice and played fantastic! The price was reasonable too. Considering they have overhead and payroll to contend with the likes of eBay and Amazon. They landed me a VERY competitive price and I walked out with a super nice guitar! Alex and the entire staff were class acts and treated me like they really wanted my business. Something you don’t see much of anymore in this day and age. I know where I’m going when I need another guitar!  I would recommend anyone shopping pawn businesses and such to  check these guys out first! A++

name: matthew meskill
text:
Do not go to that huge pistol & pawn shop before going to Family! Wow! The staff is amazing, friendly and knowledgeable. The selection is fantastic, anything you could want! The prices are super competitive if not the lowest around. I put a lot of time and research in before I made my purchase and Family Jewelry  & Loan is the real deal!

PART 2

Wouldn't let me do another review so here's part 2. Another visit another fantastic experience! Staff is knowledgeable and friendly! David & family have so many choices and options I feel like a kid in a candy store! I feel guilty taking up so much of their time, but not once have I felt rushed or heard that dreaded deep breath of hurry up and get out like you get other places. In you are looking for jewelry,  computers, tools, games, movies, guns shop here first!

name: Ralph Cantrell
text:
This might be the best pawn shop in town. The atmosphere was several degrees better than your average pawn shop - very clean and well lit, customer friendly, and the folks running the place were very conscientious and genuinely nice. We actually felt welcomed and appreciated for just stopping by to browse. Even my wife and teenager really liked the place and they are both easily "sketched-out" by any kind of second hand store.

I was really impressed with all the good stuff for sale. All of it was very nicely displayed too. There were guns of all kinds and other hunting equipment, tools, musical instruments, high-end sunglasses, games, sports equipment, rods and reels, portable air conditioners, TVs and other electronics - you name it - and LOTS of top quality jewelry. (I'm pretty sure wifey plans to sneak back over there without me :-0 )

The prices seem fair and are clearly marked, but don't be afraid to ask for an even better deal. I was able to negotiate a great price on a particular item I had been needing for a long time but could never bring myself to purchase. Now I am glad I waited.

This place is a 5-star business for sure.

Thanks, Family Jewelry and Loan!!

resp.text: Ralph Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  We work really hard on keeping a clean, organized store.  We understand that a comfortable environment is really important now a days to make everyone feel welcome, and we strive to do this on a daily basis.  We really appreciate your business and look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Todd Zelenka (zeltod)
text:
I stopped in the store at a recommendation from a friend at church.  I was looking for a ring for my wife to celebrate our 10 years together.  I have to say that the ring I found was an EXCELLENT deal - I am not a jewelry expert and was a little uneasy about buying jewelry from a pawn shop.  I was told that the shop would stand behind the ring and wrote the details about the ring on my receipt that they would guarantee.

The next day I went to a local jewelry store to see what kind of deal I got.  Man was I surprised - I not only got a confirmation of the details of the ring were 100% correct - I was told that the ring was worth 5 times what I paid for it......I couldn't have been happier.

To know that I got a great deal on a great piece of jewelry alone would bring me back to this store.  Then add the friendly, customer centered, genuine service I received from the staff and  I will be a customer for a long time.  In fact, I came back a couple weeks later and bought a cool watch.

Make this your first or last stop and you will be glad you did.

resp.text: Thank you Todd we appreciate your business and are glad your happy with your purchase.  We pride ourselves on having the BEST jewelry prices in town.
